nav.class: navbar navbar-light border-top shadow-sm d-print-none mt-3 mb-3

option.t-att-selected: gen == gender if gender else gen == partner.gender if partner else null
application == application_type if application_type else application == partner.application_type if partner else null

label.span: How many members staying with you?
Do you want to change your Voter Id card Address

option.t-att-selected: change_address == change_voter_id_address if change_voter_id_address else change_address == partner.change_voter_id_address if partner else null
room == room_details if room_details else room == partner.room_details if partner else null
citizenship_val == citizenship if citizenship else citizenship_val == partner.citizenship if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: row s_col_no_resize s_col_no_bgcolor passport_field #{(partner and partner.citizenship != 'Overseas') and 'd-none' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: birth_country.id == int(birth_country_id) if birth_country_id else birth_country.id == partner.birth_country_id.id if partner else birth_country.code == 'IN' if birth_country.code else null
birth_state.id == int(birth_state_id) if birth_state_id else birth_state.id == partner.birth_state_id.id if partner else null
relation == relation_type if relation_type else relation == partner.relation_type if partner else null
profile == work_profile if work_profile else profile == partner.work_profile if partner else null
kanha_location.id == int(kanha_location_id) if kanha_location_id else kanha_location.id == partner.kanha_location_id.id if partner else null

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: existing_voter_id_number

select.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
select.name: country_id

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id if partner else country.code == 'IN' if country.code else null

select.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
select.name: state_id

option.t-att-selected: state.id == int(state_id) if state_id else state.id == partner.state_id.id if partner else null

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: assembly_constituency

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: house_number

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: locality

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: town

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: post_office

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: zip

input.t-att-disabled: None if partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' else 'true'
input.name: district

option.t-att-selected: gen == gender if gender else gen == partner.gender if partner else null
application == application_type if application_type else application == partner.application_type if partner else null

div.label: How many members staying with you?
Do you want to change your Voter Id card Address

option.t-att-selected: change_address == change_voter_id_address if change_voter_id_address else change_address == partner.change_voter_id_address if partner else null
room == room_details if room_details else room == partner.room_details if partner else null
citizenship_val == citizenship if citizenship else citizenship_val == partner.citizenship if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: passport_field form-group #{error.get('passport_number') and 'o_has_error' or ''} col-xl-6 d-none

option.t-att-selected: birth_country.id == int(birth_country_id) if birth_country_id else birth_country.id == partner.birth_country_id.id if partner else birth_country.code == 'IN' if birth_country.code else null
birth_state.id == int(birth_state_id) if birth_state_id else birth_state.id == partner.birth_state_id.id if partner else null
relation == relation_type if relation_type else relation == partner.relation_type if partner else null
profile == work_profile if work_profile else profile == partner.work_profile if partner else null
kanha_location.id == int(kanha_location_id) if kanha_location_id else kanha_location.id == partner.kanha_location_id.id if partner else null
country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id if partner else country.code == 'IN' if country.code else null
state.id == int(state_id) if state_id else state.id == partner.state_id.id if partner else null

section.class: pt40 s_text_block pb40 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1

span.class: d-block fa fa-4x fa-thumbs-up mx-auto rounded-circle bg-primary

div.h4: The form has been sent successfully.
